column1: #Text=When it comes to one's portfolio, sovereignty takes on less meaning, something that the late Mel Hurtig failed to point out.
#Text=We don't have sabers to rattle and our workforce has less and less to work at.
#Text=Let's just sign the TPP and pull the sheet up over what's left.
#Text=Who are we to be concerned about China's domestication of the western Pacific, the Indian Ocean and east Africa ?
